CustomField.description: Phone Number for warranty services department. Used in the Warranty Conga Templates
CustomField.formula: IF( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Commercial_Warranty', $Setup.Warranty_Claims_Defaults__c.Warranty_Office_Phone__c , CASE(Warranty_Service_Region__c, 'US', $Setup.Warranty_Claims_Defaults__c.US_Toll_Free__c, 'Eastern Canada', $Setup.Warranty_Claims_Defaults__c.Eastern_Canada_Toll_Free__c, 'Western Canada', $Setup.Warranty_Claims_Defaults__c.Western_Canada_Toll_Free__c, null) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Phone Number for warranty services department. Used in the Warranty Conga Templates
CustomField.label: Conga: Warranty Office Phone
